statement.requirement:
SubscriptionTopic FASTConsentSubscriptionTopic

This topic is defined as an auto-backported R5 SubscriptionTopic (see note below), so this means the requirements for processing it are defined in the captured R5 requirements below. Note: its raw representation (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-consent-management/SubscriptionTopic-FASTConsentSubscriptionTopic.json) is as a Basic resource.
